challenge_info.description: Persona-based Document Intelligence for T2D Management

documents.title: Clinical Practice Guideline on Type 2 Diabetes Management
GLP-1 Receptor Agonists and Cardiovascular Outcomes
SGLT2 Inhibitors in CKD and Type 2 Diabetes
Patient Education and Lifestyle Intervention Protocol

job_to_be_done.task: Summarize the latest evidence-based best practices on managing newly diagnosed Type 2 diabetes patients, and develop a stepwise treatment plan tailored to patient comorbidities that can be applied in a primary care setting.
